alert.note: Alert for Benton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 12 at 11:32PM CDT until July 13 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Missouri, including the following county, Benton. * WHEN...Until 500 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Warsaw, Lincoln, Edmonson, Whitakerville, Lakeview Heights, Hastain, Palo Pinto, Racket, Zora, Truman Lake, Lake of The Ozarks and Truman State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
